BibleStudyGui::UISearchResultsWidget

BibleStudyGui::UISearchResultsWidget Class Reference

This class is an implementation of a view from the Qt Model/View framework for a table view which displays the results of a text search. More...

#include <UISearchResultsWidget.h>

Detailed Description

This class is an implementation of a view from the Qt Model/View framework for a table view which displays the results of a text search.
